LanguageData.WaterDeer.label: water deer
LanguageData.WaterDeer.description: Water Deer are fanged deer native to Asia. Although water deer resemble extinct primitive deer in lacking antlers, they evolved from ancestors with antlers that were subsequently lost.
LanguageData.WaterDeer.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.WaterDeer.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.WaterDeer.tools.teeth.label: teeth
